post.text: A young girl asked Hillary, "Do you think when you're president, you'll be paid as much as a man?"

comment.author: Morgan
comment.text: Y'all realize voting for her is setting a precedent. You're saying, it's ok to buy and rig an election. You're saying It doesn't matter what the people want. You are voting against democracy. You are saying our votes don't matter and that's ok. You are saying it's ok to cheat we will reward you for it. Good job America you are ensuring there will be more rigged elections.

replies.author: Bailey
replies.text: You mean kinda like Bush did?

replies.author: Morgan
replies.text: Bailey I promise I will not vote for Bush in this election if you promise you won't vote for ary

replies.author: Morgan
replies.text: See that's the problem right there. Dems knew it was wrong when bush did it but now it's ok cause it's ary. And so it will continue. Why would they stop when the people do nothing about it? And when a republican does it the other side will cry. Why do we put our morals aside to back a criminal and a cheater? Dem for life right or wrong? Is that the deal? Btw I didn't vote for bush I am not a republican or a democrat. I'm an American who is tired of corrupt politicians

replies.author: Samantha
replies.text: rigged election? no evidence of that. she won the majority of the votes. the people have spoken. they prefer her and her ideas. period.

replies.author: Morgan
replies.text: Lol right close ur eyes much?
